channel.title: Plz help!
channel.description:
i need help making a shop...well shops. i know what 2 do but it wont work 4 me. i need a rare shop and a custom shop.
rare shop ids: 1038 1040 1042 1044 1046 1048 1050 1054 <--- NOTE: I SKIPPED 1052!!! (it is cape of legends) 1056 1058
custom shop ids: 9003 13664 <--- incase u needed d claws id this is it 8001 9765 12233 15000 13009 12770 12613 13650 10016 10014 12772 12617 15602 11333 14516 12028 13665 13670 13645 i know the 2nd shop is huge but i have a whole list of customs (:
i ld really appreciate it if you mde it 4 me (:
i tried mking a rae shop but every time i try trading the prson get disconnected.
i have the reddeathscape client which can see all the customs so im guessing it is a 508+ but im pretty sure it is a 526 or sothing like that, && base is dragzscape so it is a 317.
NPCS YOU CAN'T USE: shop keeper bow and arrow saleman nulodion bandit shopkeeper gerrant shop assistant ghost shopkeeper sandwich lady dark mage thessalia combat intructor customer shop keeper (newish looking one w/o hood) shop keeper(w/ hood)
shop ids: 73 74
plz include the shop name so i know which is which //(shopname)
I WOULD LIKE TO THANK YU IN ADVANCE FOR HELPING ME!!!
